item.title: Why is Ken Enterprises Ltd falling/rising?
item.description: As of 21-Jan, Ken Enterprises Ltd has experienced a notable decline in its share price, reflecting broader challenges in its market performance and investor engagement despite marginal outperformance relative to its sector today. Time: 13 hours ago

item.title: Why is Chamunda Electrical Ltd falling/rising?
item.description: As of 21-Jan, Chamunda Electrical Ltd’s stock price has fallen by 3.23% to ₹46.45, reflecting a broader trend of underperformance relative to both its sector and benchmark indices. Time: 13 hours ago
